available if a clear save file exists on the player's profile

demon fang.Description:
the projectile penetrates targets after 400 uses
forces downed enemies to stand after 400 uses

arc fire.Description: forces downed enemies to stand after 200 uses

guardian field.Description:
heals up to 15% of max HP at a rate of 5% HP per burst
heals up to 24% of max HP at a rate of 8% HP per burst after 400 uses

punishing shot.Description: adds an additional hit after 200 uses

terra rupture.Description: pulls enemies towards Alvin after 200 uses

homing shot.Description: Alvin becomes airborne after executing this attack

pulse shot.Description: forces downed enemies to stand after 200 uses

cross cleave.Description: adds an additional hit after 200 and 400 uses

fierce demon fang.Description: area of effect increases after 400 uses of Demon Fang

sonic barrage.Description: forces downed enemies to stand, then returns them to a downed state

arc blaze.Description: forces downed enemies to stand after 200 uses of Arc Fire

guardian grove.Description:
heals 15% of max HP at a rate of 5% HP per burst
heals up to 24% of max HP at a rate of 8% HP per burst after 400 uses of Guardian Field
movement is available before the healing glyph disappears
attack speed increases after 200 uses of Guardian Field

punishing beam.Description:
forces downed enemies to stand with the first hit after 200 uses of Punishing Shot
final hit still knocks down enemies

homing cannon.Description: Alvin becomes airborne after executing this attack

sweeping shot.Description: forces downed enemies to stand after 200 uses of Pulse Shot

devil flare.Description: aerial-enabled after 100 uses of Dark Radiance

muzzle roar.Description: adds an additional hit after 200 and 400 uses of Cross Cleave

hell fryer.Description:
attacks faster while the Charge ability is active
Alvin becomes airborne after executing this attack

terminus pride.Requirements:
Over Limit mode must be active
activated by using Hell Fryer and holding the Attack button

severed fate.Description:
hold down the Artes button to lower the delay between the knives being thrown and falling back down
area of effect increases after 100 uses

marche waltz.Description: forces downed enemies to stand after 100 uses

meteoric waltz.Description:
marks the ground with a magic glyphs that erupt with an earth spike when an enemy steps on it
aerial-enabled after 100 uses
projectiles increase by three at 200 uses, and by one at 400 uses

spectral purge.Description:
marks an enemy or the area in front of Rowen with a glyph that explodes after a few seconds
only the explosion is capable of knockdown

fireball.Description: press the Artes button while Arte Tuning is active to rapidly shoot up to three more fireballs

wind lance.Description: press the Artes button while Arte Tuning is active to shoot one bolt per target in front of Rowen simultaneously

rock trine.Description: press the Artes button while Arte Tuning is active to hit the target again with more rocks

splash.Description: move the left control stick while Arte Tuning is active to control the flow of water

air pressure.Description: press the Artes button while Arte Tuning is active to add more pressure adds one final hit that causes knockdown

blue sphere.Description: press and hold the Attack button while Arte Tuning is active to increase the range of the spell

freeze lancer.Description: press the Artes button while Arte Tuning is active to increase the number of hits

shimmering toll.Description: rotate the left control stick while Arte Tuning is active to increase the number of hits

tightening chains.Description:
use the left control stick while Arte Tuning is active to add an extra hit aimed toward the input
            direction

roche Waltz.Description: use the left control stick while Arte Tuning is active to control the movement of the spell

diffusional drive.Description:
use the left control stick while Arte Tuning is active to control the center of the spell
          heals 8-10% of max HP to all allies

glacial core.Description: use the left control stick while Arte Tuning is active to control the movement of the spell

divine streak.Description: use the left control stick while Arte Tuning is active to control the direction of the spell

grand finale.Requirements:
Over Limit mode must be active
activated by using Tidal Wave and holding the Attack button

pow hammer.Description:
chance to inflict Stun increases while Teepo OFF is active
chance to inflict Stun increases after 100 uses

teepo spray.Description:
while Teepo OFF is active
range and projectile speed decrease, and projectile size increases
adds an additional hit after 200 uses
while Teepo ON is active, projectile speed and range increases after 100 uses

teepo quake.Description:
Max Hits is increased while Teepo OFF is active
adds an additional hit after 200 uses
forces downed enemies to stand after 200 uses

teepo roar.Description:
attack range and knock-back distance increases while Teepo OFF is active
chance to guard break is available after 100 uses

teepo copter.Description:
Max Hits and flight duration is increased while Teepo OFF is active
precision in chasing enemies increases after 400 and 1000 uses

teepo squash.Description:
area of effect increases while Teepo OFF is active
area of effect increases after 100 and 200 uses

teepo vacuum.Description:
Max Hits is increased while Teepo OFF is active
can only damage light-weight class monsters
mid-weight monsters class can be swallowed after 100 uses
heavy-weight monsters class can be swallowed after 400 uses
super-heavy-weight monsters class can be swallowed after 1000 uses

pixie circle.Description:
heals 10% of max HP to all allies within a small area
 healing increases to 20% of max HP and range increases while Teepo ON is active

recover.Description: cures all negative status ailments for one ally

healing circle.Description:
heals up to 40% of max HP at a rate of 10% per burst to all allies within a moderate area
healing increases to 50% of max HP at the same rate while Teepo ON is active

dispel.Description:
cures all negative status ailments for all allies
provides an effect that prevents negative status ailments temporarily while Teepo ON is active

resurrection.Description:
heals 50% of max HP to one ally
if the ally is knocked out, revives that ally with 50% of max HP healed

negative gate.Description:
pulls enemies towards the center of this spell
pulling power is increased while Teepo ON is active

nurse.Description:
heals 50% of max HP to all allies
healing increases to 60% of max HP while Teepo ON is active

revive.Description:
automatically revives the affected ally upon being knocked out
effect not shared by linked allies

dark visitor.Description: chance to cause instant death is increased while Teepo ON is active

dread wings.Description: hit count is increased while Teepo ON is active

scary-go-round.Requirements: Over Limit mode must be active activated by using Ignite Terror and holding the Attack button

spiral strike.Description: Leia becomes airborne after executing this attack

cerberus strike.Description:
attack speed increases after 200 uses
knockdown is enabled during the final hit while in midair
Leia becomes airborne after executing this attack

swallow flight.Description:
chance of inflicting burn increases after 200 uses
forces downed enemies to stand after 400 uses
Leia becomes airborne after executing this attack

rabid lunge.Description:
chance to guard break available after 100 uses
prevents Leia from being staggered while using this arte after 100 uses
attack speed increases after 200 uses
the back-stepping motion which concludes the arte can be cancelled with any action

crescent flash.Description:
range increases after 200 uses
forces enemies to face a different direction and pushes them away

staff rain.Description:
hold down the Artes button to perform additional hits
when performed on the ground, hits increase by one after 100, 200, 400, 1000, 2000, and 4000 uses
when performed in mid-air, hits increase by one after 100, 200, and 400 uses

soaring vortex.Description:
area of effect increases after 200 uses
this arte will not activate unless an enemy that is not knocked down is within range

soaring blast.Description:
Leia becomes airborne after executing this attack
area of effect increases the higher Leia is in the air
knocks enemies higher into the air after 200 uses

first aid.Description: heals 30% of max HP to one ally

sharpness.Description: increases base physical and magical attack power of one ally by 40% for 10 seconds

barrier.Description: increases base physical and magical defense of one ally by 50% for 10 seconds

heal.Description: heals 50% of max HP to one ally

resurrection.Description:
heals 50% of max HP to one ally
          if the ally is knocked out, revives that ally with 50% of max HP healed

quickness.Description: increases movement speed of one ally by 20% for 10 seconds

elemental impulse.Description:
applies an element the targeted enemy is weak against to one ally's weapon for 30 seconds
          attacks with an elemental attribute are unaffected by this spell
          if the targeted enemy is not weak against any element, an element is chosen at random

cure.Description: heals 70% of max HP to one ally

soulstoke celebration.Requirements:
Over Limit mode must be active
activated by using Soulstoke Spin and holding the Attack button

shimmer spin.Description:
Milla becomes airborne after executing this attack
          area of effect increases after 100 and 400 uses
          attack speed increases after 200 uses

sigil spear.Description:
attack speed increases after 100 uses
          adds two additional hits after 400 uses
          requires Milla to be in melee range to deal the max hit count, otherwise deals two less hits

blade torrent.Description:
forces downed enemies to stand after 100 uses
          attack speed increases after 200 uses

binding sphere.Description:
area of effect increases after 100
          adds one additional hit after 100 and 200 uses
          knocks down enemies if they are hit into the air

condemnation.Description:
if an enemy fails to guard this attack, the enemy is marked with a glyph that explodes after a few seconds
            causing knockdown
          the explosion occurs regardless of whether the target is alive or not, the glyph remains on the field
            where the target was defeated
          attack speed increases after 200 uses

death knell.Description:
attack speed increases after 200 uses
          area of effect increases after 400 uses

bolt strike.Description: this spell's area of effect is controllable

sunburst.Description:
this spell can affect only monsters that are near the ground

cyclone.Description: this spell's area of effect is controllable

thunder blade.Description: this spell's area of effect is centered on the target

shining prism.Description: this spell's area of effect is controllable

flare bomb (fireball).Description: when activated from Sunburst, the last five hits cause knockdown

flare bomb (flame ring).Description: when activated from Sunburst, the last five hits cause knockdown

flare bomb (sunburst).Description: when activated from Sunburst, the last five hits cause knockdown

Wind Blade (Wind Lance).Description:
- all variations require Milla to be in melee range to deal the max hit count
- the first slash forces downed enemies to stand after 400 uses
- when activated from Arrivederci or Cyclone, Milla goes airborne after the first slash
- when activated from Cyclone:
  - the final hit will cause knockdown
  - when activated from the ground, the final hit can be canceled by attacking, back stepping, or performing another arte

Wind Blade (Arrivederci).Description:
- all variations require Milla to be in melee range to deal the max hit count
- the first slash forces downed enemies to stand after 400 uses
- when activated from Arrivederci or Cyclone, Milla goes airborne after the first slash
- when activated from Cyclone:
  - the final hit will cause knockdown
  - when activated from the ground, the final hit can be canceled by attacking, back stepping, or performing another arte

Wind Blade (Cyclone).Description:
- all variations require Milla to be in melee range to deal the max hit count
- the first slash forces downed enemies to stand after 400 uses
- when activated from Arrivederci or Cyclone, Milla goes airborne after the first slash
- when activated from Cyclone:
  - the final hit will cause knockdown
  - when activated from the ground, the final hit can be canceled by attacking, back stepping, or performing another arte

Grave.Description:
/*adds an additional hit and slightly increases range at 200 and 400 uses
when activated in midair, this arte brings Milla to the ground

aqua protection.Description: adds an area of effect, centered on Milla, with a very small range after 200 uses

lightning (bolt strike).Description:
- when activated from Bolt Strike:
  - adds one additional hit after 200 and 400 uses
  - these additional hits extend the range of effect of Lightning
- when activated from Thunder Blade: adds one additional hit after 200 uses, which widens the arc effect of Lightning

lightning (thunder blade).Description:
- when activated from Bolt Strike:
 - adds one additional hit after 200 and 400 uses
  - these additional hits extend the range of effect of Lightning
- when activated from Thunder Blade: adds one additional hit after 200 uses, which widens the arc effect of Lightning

radiant rondo (divine streak).Description: Milla becomes airborne when activated from Shining Prism

radiant rondo (shining prism).Description: Milla becomes airborne when activated from Shining Prism

cloud pierce.Description: Milla becomes airborne after executing this attack

overdrive.Requirements: Event: acquired from the book Arte Tome: "Spirit Surge" (絶技の書「霊煌疾走」?), obtained after completing the game
